nodes.text: @ECMcLaughlin I'm with you.  Can we go just one day without the police killing a POC?\n\nThis is not right.  We need MAJOR change in the way the police think and act.
@Chuckledoodle @ECMcLaughlin Probably not. People do stupid shit all the time and sometimes they get shot for it

Good morning to everyone except people who don’t understand how insidiously white supremacy has trained your brain to accept police violence against Black and brown and indigenous people.\n\nStill hot. Barely slept. Angry. Again.
@ECMcLaughlin Yikes. How long are you going to bend over?
@ECMcLaughlin @180pennystocks How some feel about late term or multiple abortions by some people
